page.title: 15A POSTMAN IN SUTTON VENY
page.content:
My Dads job is a postman and so he has to get up at 3 o'clock in the morning. In winter time it can be very cold. Sometimes I go downstairs to see him get ready.
It takes at least two to three hours to do one of his rounds. He does three deliveries. He does a first post, second post and a parcel delivery to peoples houses. On Fridays he comes in at 7 pm and on Saturdays at 11 am.
A postmans job is very tiring because he sometimes has to cycle or walk, often he drives a post van. One morning when it had snowed I had to help my Dad deliver the post.
